scripts.build: npm run clear-wwwroot && npm run copy && npm run sass
scripts.copy: concurrently "npm run copy-images" "npm run copy-work-history" "npm run copy-highlight" "npm run copy-svg" "npm run copy-webconfig"
scripts.sass: node-sass --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --linefeed crlf --output-style expanded --precision 10 Client/sass/styles.scss -out-file wwwroot/css/styles.css
scripts.sass-watch: node-sass -w --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --linefeed crlf --output-style expanded --precision 10 Client/sass/styles.scss -out-file wwwroot/css/styles.css
